column1: Uchi////We love love love trying new sushi places in the city
column2: this place didn't disappoint. It is definitely on the pricy end
column3: but the quality of food matches it. The only downside is that the serving sizes are pretty small
column4: but if you get a few dishes between a couple people everyone can try different things. They definitely do more modern
column5: interesting sushi mashups but it was fun to try!
